title: Windmills Cause Cancer
summary: Trump claimed at rally: 'If you have a windmill anywhere near your house, congratulations, your house just went down 75 percent in value. And they say the noise causes cancer.' No scientific evidence supports this.
keyFacts: April 2019 rally: 'If you have a windmill anywhere near your house, congratulations, your house just went down 75 percent in value'
Continued: 'And they say the noise causes cancer'
No scientific evidence supports this claim according to American Cancer Society
Repeated variations of this claim at multiple rallies
Part of Trump's broader opposition to wind energy
